contextual_notes: The user is focused on finding an accessible home suitable for their studies, indicating specific needs.

general_insights: Providing clear guidance and support early in the conversation can help improve initial user satisfaction.
Encouragement and positive reinforcement can sustain user engagement and satisfaction.
Offering tools or frameworks for complex decision-making can help users feel more in control and satisfied.
